name: Metabolic / Insulin-Resistant PCOS
clinical_goal: Stabilize blood glucose and lower HOMA-IR index.
dietary_focus: Low Glycemic Index (GI), High Fiber, Complex Carbs, High Protein
lifestyle_avoids: Eating late at night (stops fat burning)

supplement_rules.specific_benefit: Inositol mimics insulin signaling, helping your body use sugar for energy instead of storing it as fat.

exercise_rules.specific_benefit: Building muscle creates a 'sink' for excess blood sugar.

name: Inflammatory / Lean PCOS
clinical_goal: Reduce systemic inflammation (CRP) and repair gut lining.

supplement_rules.specific_benefit: NAC serves as a powerful antioxidant to lower CRP (inflammation markers) and improve egg quality.

exercise_rules.specific_benefit: Gentle movement flushes out inflammatory toxins without stressing the body.

name: Adrenal / Stress-Driven PCOS
clinical_goal: Regulate cortisol rhythm and prevent hypoglycemia.
dietary_focus: Blood sugar balance, Magnesium-rich, Warm cooked foods

supplement_rules.specific_benefit: Magnesium calms the nervous system and lowers cortisol, which is the root driver of this phenotype.

exercise_rules.specific_benefit: Slow, deliberate movement builds strength without triggering the 'Fight or Flight' response.

name: Hyperandrogenic PCOS
clinical_goal: Increase SHBG levels and block androgen receptors.

supplement_rules.specific_benefit: Zinc inhibits 5-alpha-reductase, the enzyme that turns Testosterone into DHT (which causes acne and hair loss).

exercise_rules.specific_benefit: Consistent activity helps the liver flush out excess hormones.
